washHands_m: Wash your hands with soap and water for atleast 20 seconds. If this is not possible, use alchol-based hand rub for cleansing your hands.
socialDistance_m: Keep a distance of atleast 1 meter from anyone showing the symptoms.
handshakes_m: Don't make unnecessary hand gestures and avoid sharing belongings.
wearMasks_m: Use protective masks if you must go out. Properly dispose the used masks frequently.
avoidGathering_m: Don't go to social gatherings. Use the lockdown creatively and stay away from massess since the virus is highly contagious.',
medicalAssistance_m: Don't hesitate to take medical assistance. If you or anyone around you show signs of the disease contact the nearest hospital immediately.
